messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I WANT ALL DOORS CLOSED, ONLY SECURITY AND BORGS WILL GO OUT OF THEIR PLACES, CLOSE EVERYTHING, THSI IS QUARANTINE, GOD SPEED, GENTLEMEN.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: ATTENTION. UNIDENTIFIED ENERGY SIGNATURE DETECTED. STATION WITHIN RAGE OF UNIDENTIFIED SIGNATURE.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Attention: All Non-Security or Non-Head Personnel found roaming the streets are considered Zombies and are to be perma brigged as in my "How To Survive Zombies" Textbook from SpaceBay.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: HAHAHA..THE GATES OF HELL HAVE FINNALY BEEN OPENED...I AM FREE FROM LAVALAND TO RAVAGE THE GALAXY..STARTING..WITH YOU...

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Welp, Satan is against us, Just remember, DO NOT GET OUT OF YOUR PLACES.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: ATTENTION. LARGE ENERGY SIGNATURE DETECTED IN BRID-YOU SONS OF WHORES WILL ALL DIE

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: ATTENTION. THIS IS CENTCOMM. WERE TRYING TO GET ONE LAST MESSAGE TO YOU! WERE UNDER SIEGE BY DEMONS! WE'RE SENDING YOU A CARE PACKAGE SOMEWHERE ON THE STATION. CODENAME: DOOM. FIND IT! SAVE YOURSELVES!-Transmission Cut.-

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to bad luck, not more than 15 mice have migrated into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: ATTENTION, LARGE ENERGY SIGNATURE DETECTED NEAR SHUTTLE.
